title: My Love in the Countryside
overview: Saisamorn Suaisamoe, a top actor who comes from a wealthy family, is sent by the director of her new project to live in Lat Chado in Ayutthaya and learn about love. Here, she has to move into the house of Marasri, a sharp-mouthed woman and she's being followed around by someone called Mha. How will this end? Can she learn about love? Who will be the hero in this love movie?
